description.oldValue:
Users are now able to click through the annotation
layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current
annotation session.
description.newValue: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session. Note: We are postponing the rollout of this feature at this time, and it will only be available in the new Teams experience. We apologize for any inconvenience.
